anpl:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    output_grid = np.copy(input_grid)
    (x1, y1, x2, y2) = " Traversing from the beginning, find the coordinates of the first blue point(x1,y1) and the coordinates of the last blue point(x2,y2) "(output_grid)
    listb = " Generate a list to record all blue coordinates "(output_grid)
    for (x, y) in listb:
        (x3, y3) = (x1 + x2 - x, y1 + y2 - y)
        output_grid = " If the point(x3,y3) is black, turn it red"(output_grid, (x3, y3))
    return output_grid
